Articles.Content:
Viperwolf and myself have decided to join forces and bring to you a bunch of craft designs of ours as well as a few parts. This comes after a funny yet good suggestion by sirkut that the two wolves should form a Wolf Pack... lol

Anyways keep your eyes posted here for our designs using many different mods and we will create a pack which will be posted to the Spaceport and list any mods that may be needed for the craft.

Also on the way once i get blender under control is some parts for making unique looking crafts.

WPA Roster:

Toyotawolf - Co-CEO

Viperwolf - Co-CEO

Cpat Sierra - R&D

Sirkut - Head of R&D

To enhance our crafts we are also releasing some new parts that are currently in production.

Coming Soon:

Radial Extendo by MSI

Included crafts in the pack:

Coming Soon..

Edited August 15, 2013 by Toyotawolf
Jet intake, gonna set it up to do some cool stuff with a custom air resource.

Oh no... Chrysler and Toyota have merged!

Jokes aside, The reaction wheel looks nice. What will the crafts be capable of?

Oh no... Chrysler and Toyota have merged!

Jokes aside, The reaction wheel looks nice. What will the crafts be capable of?

Skies are really the limit on what they will be capable of, there will be many crafts included. SSTO's, Shuttlecraft, Interstellar, etc.

Jet intake, gonna set it up to do some cool stuff with a custom air resource.

Nice idea.....seems I have heard it somewhere before....

Nice idea.....seems I have heard it somewhere before....

Cool, glad the idea is out there let's make it happen eh?
Hey, Toyota, any chance the wolfpack has a tie to NC State?

Hey, Toyota, any chance the wolfpack has a tie to NC State?

LOL no unfortunately it was a joke sirkut made and we decided to run with it and he is helping us out too.

Oh no... Chrysler and Toyota have merged!

Jokes aside, The reaction wheel looks nice. What will the crafts be capable of?

lol thinking about that, ive had this name sense the first Viper rolled out. I took my favorite car and merged it with my favorite animal.

We are going to touch bases on everything, even rovers, carriers, trailers, and so on. and some weird Kerbal stuff along the way. And if you want a certain feature on a certain craft, i believe that can be managed also.

Edited August 14, 2013 by viperwolf

As part of WPA, I'd like to show off some of what we are working on. This, the air intake, and radial reaction wheel parts, can all be found over in the Sierra's Spare Parts dev thread as well has here.
Parts have been sent to beta tester for testing.
